Brief description of changes made in this PR.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Diagram update
- [ ] Contract change (affects CONTRACT.md or compliance requirements)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)

Related to #(issue number)

- [ ] New documentation added

## Quality Checks

- [ ] All markdown linting passes
- [ ] All links are valid
- [ ] Mermaid diagrams render correctly
- [ ] Content is public-safe (no proprietary information)
- [ ] Content follows documentation standards
- [ ] Spelling and grammar checked

## Public-Safe Check

- [ ] No internal URLs or proprietary references
- [ ] No employer/client names
- [ ] No confidential information
- [ ] All examples use generic placeholders

## Testing

- [ ] Documentation reviewed locally
- [ ] Links tested
- [ ] Diagrams verified
- [ ] Content reviewed for accuracy

**Checklist for Reviewers**:
